sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AutoResolutionTopicRefQualifier</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AutoResolutionTopicRefQualifier</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AutoResolutionTopicRefQualifier = Class.create();
AutoResolutionTopicRefQualifier.prototype = {
	
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	getTopics: function(autoResConfigSysId) {
		var supportedTopicSysIDList = [];
		var autoResConfigGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_auto_resolution_configuration');
		autoResConfigGr.get(autoResConfigSysId);

		supportedTopicSysIDList = AutoResolutionUtil.getActiveTopicsForDomain(autoResConfigGr);
		return 'sys_idIN' + supportedTopicSysIDList.join(',');
	},

    type: 'AutoResolutionTopicRefQualifier'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-02-10 23:50:50</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>89ce53f073d22010f14a063f34f6a7c9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AutoResolutionTopicRefQualifier</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">85493a472f800110d8a4d5f62799b6a9</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_89ce53f073d22010f14a063f34f6a7c9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-05-10 21:59:32</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>536</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
